alert.note: Alert for Jones (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued March 16 at 7:26PM EDT until March 16 at 8:15PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: The National Weather Service in Peachtree City has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Jones County in central Georgia... * Until 815 PM EDT. * At 726 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Clinton, or over Gray, moving east at 10 mph. HAZARD...Half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. * Locations impacted include... Gray, Ethridge, James, Bradley, Wayside, Haddock, Greenberry Crossroads, Clinton and Blountsville. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. If you see wind damage...hail or flooding...wait until the storm has passed...and then call the National Weather Service toll free at 1 8 6 6 7 6 3 4 4 6 6 or tweet us your report at NWSATLANTA.
